name: Gone But Not Forgotten
description:
Experience the heartbreak of a cute kitten as he journeys through the 5 stages of grief after separating from his owner.

♡ Help a kitten mend his broken heart, and reunite him with his owner!

♡ Work through Denial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression and Acceptance!

♡  Explore deep emotional bonds, and the power of love! 

Play Now!

Team:

Micah Mahelona: Lead Artist

Matthew Hill: Programmer and Level Designer

Mrinmoyee Mishra: Programmer and Level Designer

Music by: Ketsa, Shane Ivers, and Siddhartha Corsus
